CustomField.description: Flood assistance services provided / requested during the 2022 Floods
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Using the multi-picklist, please select one or more services that have been requested, or are required, by the person or family being supported. You may select one or more using this multi-picklist at any time, which does not in any way relate to funded service delivery. However, if there are no values that accurately capture the needs or requests, please use the text box below to describe them.
CustomField.label: Flood Assistance Services
